title: Dmitri Redkovich
text:
Dmitri Pavlovich Redkovich (; born 15 January 1998) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a> on loan from <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Moscow">FC Torpedo Moscow</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Chertanovo%20Moscow">FC Chertanovo Moscow</a> on 20 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Moscow">FC Torpedo Moscow</a>. He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Chertanovo%20Moscow">FC Chertanovo Moscow</a> on 17 July 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a>.
